## Goal -- recreate the Bash tool `head` in Python

### print n lines command line arg or use default

### Intended Code
```{python, eval = FALSE}
import sys
filename = sys.argv[1]
if len(sys.argv) > 2:
  n_lines = int(sys.argv[2])
else:
  n_lines = 10
for i, line in enumerate(open(filename)):
  if i < n_lines:
    print(line, end="")
```
